content: Online-to-offline (O2O) commerce is a business model that seeks to seamlessly integrate the online and offline experiences for customers, both before and after purchase. By moving potential customers from online platforms to physical stores, O2O businesses aim to take advantage of the benefits of both modes. With the goal of expanding their customer reach, capturing a larger market share, and increasing marketing capabilities, retailers often use various advertising and email campaigns to attract online customers to make purchases in brick-and-mortar stores. O2O is one of the latest e-commerce business models that combines the best of both online and offline approaches to help businesses achieve these benefits and more.
